how_to_implement: To successfully implement this search, you must be ingesting endpoint data via Microsoft Windows Sysmon and must extract the Image and Parent Image field.
search: | search sourcetype=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational process=reg.exe signature_id=13 dest={dest} | table _time dest action object object_path EventDescription Details
search_description: This search queries the Sysmon logs to give you details of the latest registry values for a specific destination computer.
